songs.title: CASCADE
songs.lyrics:
[verse 1: Amir Obe]
Yeah
Still drivin' through the red lights
Tryin' to get my head right
Come alive on a full moon
Won't survive, I'll be gone soon
I put the past in a ashtray
Tequila pourin' like a cascade
Just hit reverse in the fast lane
Something beautiful, a nice place
I be at the W for eight nights
Said I would only hit you up on a late night
Come alive on a full moon
Won't survive gone soon

[Verse 2: K. Roosevelt]

[?]

[Chorus: Amir Obe]
[?]
You ain’t gotta ask me who I’m cool with
You see the facade we all maneuver through
Karma got me thinkin' what I’ll do to you

[Verse 3: Amir Obe]
I ain’t tryin' to [?] for life
[?] at the hills gon' take my life
Swore to god I wouldn’t jinx myself
Somethin' about her made me rethink myself
Best conversation with the voice in my head
Tellin' me to go before the yellow turns red
Fight in public and rejoice in the bed
Apologize and forget what I said
Said she hate that I’m a Virgo
Only worried about the work flow
In the penthouse with the fur coat
I get vertigo I’m gonna keep the curtains closed
You just focused on the view
You need to focus on you

[Outro]
